Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (!Utils.IsForegroundFullScreen ()) {  	// TODO: Filter by window title or something in the future?  	PerformSearch ("");  	// We have to get the location of the current foreground window before we show our popup  	Rectangle windowRect = Utils.GetForegroundWindowRect ();  	Point point = Utils.GetRectCenter (windowRect);  	// Then restore and show our window  	ShowOverlay ();  	// Calculate the overlay position based on the previously active window  	this.Left = point.X - (this.Size.Width / 2);  	this.Top = point.Y - (this.Size.Height / 2);  	// Pop the window up over all other windows  	Activate ();  }  else {  	// Don't show (In fact' force hide) the overlay when there's a fullscreen window active.  	// This is to stop us from breaking fullscreen games  	HideOverlay ();  }
